fields.description:
Probably not harmful (though I haven't tested what happens if you would reference the file somewhere) but something I noticed while doing tests:

*Steps*

# Build https://github.com/appcelerator-developer-relations/appc-sample-3dtouch
# Verify {{build/iphone/Assets/xcassets/6ce9fb071294c440a20ff73b7c09fef2082c2206.imageset}} is there and not empty
# Remove the three {{shortcutItemIcon.png}} images in {{app/assets/iphone/images/}}
# Build again
# Verify {{build/iphone/Assets/xcassets/6ce9fb071294c440a20ff73b7c09fef2082c2206.imageset}} is still there but now empty
fields.summary: Incremental build after removing image leaves empty .imageasset folder
